about_the_game:
This premium pack bundles together the Scavenger Bot Accelerator along with the Marauder, Sharpshooter, and Tundra Recon Suits, and the AL-9 Clearcutter, SMP-90 Sharpshooter, and Aegis VII Survivalist weapons.

Equip yourself with everything you need to survive the horrors and unlock the secrets of the ice planet Tau Volantis. From armored snowsuits to versatile and powerful weapons, you’ll be ready for anything the Necromorphs and Unitologists throw at you. Even the score with 3 powerful weapons and a helpful bot upgrade to max out your crafting supplies.

This premium pack bundles together all the suits and weapons from the Tundra Recon Pack, the Marauder Pack, and the Sharpshooter pack, along with the Scavenger Bot Accelerator.

Pack features:

  • Tundra Recon Suit — Worn by early Tau Volantis expeditionary teams, this suit is woven to maintain body heat under any condition.

  • Marauder Suit — Issued to fearless S.C.A.F. Marauder units, this suit was used by ship boarding parties to breach Separatist defenses.

  • Sharpshooter Suit — This elite military gear was designed for the UN14 Snake Bite Special Ops Division. It features high-impact armor for maximum protection.

  • Aegis VII Survivalist — This weapon combines a Plasma Cutter and Suspended Ripper. It sports a titanium finish designed to withstand the harshest of planetary conditions.

  • AL-9 Clearcutter — The Triple Threat Pulse Rifle is perfect for taking down dense crowds, while the J-111 Hydraulic Eviscerator is sturdy enough to cut down close encounters.

  • SMP-90 Sharpshooter — This weapon is a modified version of the standard Seeker Rifle. It's paired with a wide-cutting Line Gun for achieving multiple kills in a single shot.

  • Bot Accelerator — Decreases the harvesting time for each Scavenger Bot by 50%. Useful for speedy gathering of resources that can be used to craft weapon parts, consumable items, and suit upgrades.

Equip yourself with everything you need to survive the horrors and unlock the secrets of the ice planet Tau Volantis. Even the score with 3 powerful weapons and a helpful bot upgrade to max out your crafting supplies.

This premium pack bundles together all the suits and weapons from the Tundra Recon Pack, the Marauder Pack, and the Sharpshooter pack, along with the Scavenger Bot Accelerator.

  • Bot Accelerator — Decreases the harvesting time for each Scavenger Bot by 50%. Useful for speedy gathering of resources that can be used to craft weapon parts, consumable items, and suit upgrades.
legal_notice:
Germany, Austria, and Switzerland only: EA’S PRIVACY & COOKIE POLICY (privacy.ea.com/de) APPLIES.
Other EU, United Kingdom, Norway, Iceland, Andorra, Bosnia and Herzegovina, Georgia, Kosovo, Macedonia (FYROM), Moldova, Monaco, Montenegro, San Marino, Serbia, Turkey, Vatican City (Holy See), Liechtenstein only: ACKNOWLEDGEMENT OF EA's PRIVACY & COOKIE POLICY (privacy.ea.com) REQUIRED TO PLAY.
All other residents: ACCEPTANCE OF EA PRIVACY & COOKIE POLICY (privacy.ea.com) REQUIRED TO PLAY.

INTERNET CONNECTION; EA ACCOUNT; STEAM ACCOUNT; ACCEPTANCE OF EA USER AGREEMENT (terms.ea.com) & ORIGIN END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT (ea.com/legal); AND DOWNLOAD & INSTALLATION OF THE ORIGIN CLIENT SOFTWARE (origin.com/download) REQUIRED TO PLAY. YOU MUST LINK YOUR EA AND STEAM ACCOUNTS TO PLAY; EA WILL SHARE YOUR ACCOUNT ID AND INDIVIDUAL GAME AND PLAY RECORDS WITH STEAM TO VALIDATE YOUR PURCHASE AND/OR REFUND REQUEST. ACCESS TO SOFTWARE CONTENT IS LIMITED TO ONE EA & ONE STEAM ACCOUNT & IS NON-TRANSFERABLE AFTER PURCHASE. YOU MAY NEED TO BE 13+ or 16+ TO REGISTER FOR AN EA ACCOUNT (AGE MAY VARY, SEE http://o.ea.com/ea/child-access FOR DETAILS). SOME CONTENT MAY REQUIRE GAMEPLAY TO UNLOCK. CONTENT UPDATES MAY BE DOWNLOADED AUTOMATICALLY, REQUIRE ADDITIONAL STORAGE, AND INCUR BANDWIDTH USAGE FEES. EA MAY PROVIDE CERTAIN FREE INCREMENTAL CONTENT &/OR UPDATES. EA MAY RETIRE ONLINE FEATURES AFTER 30 DAYS NOTICE POSTED ON ea.com/service-updates.

EA User Agreement: terms.ea.com/de for German residents and terms.ea.com for all other residents
EA Privacy & Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/de for German residents and privacy.ea.com for all other residents
Origin EULA: ea.com/de-de/legal for German residents and ea.com/legal for all other residents
name: Dead Space™ 3 Tau Volantis Survival Kit

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Dead Space™ 3 Tau Volantis Survival Kit - $14.99

package_groups.title: Buy Dead Space™ 3 Tau Volantis Survival Kit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.8 GHz processor or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 or better (7300, 7600 GS, and 8500 are below minimum system requirements), ATI X1600 Pro or better (X1300, X1300 Pro and HD2400 are below minimum system requirements), 256MB Video Card and Shader Model 3.0 required
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note that attempting to play the game using video hardware that isn’t listed above may result in reduced performance, graphical issues or cause the game to not run at all.

short_description: Equip yourself with everything you need to survive the horrors and unlock the secrets of the ice planet Tau Volantis.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Russian
*languages with full audio support
